column6:
Who is the mysterious TINKERER, and why is he flooding the city with technologically-enhanced villains? To unplug this threat, Spider-Man needs an upgrade of his own, starting with a new "smart stealth" BLACK COSTUME!,2006,11
32 PGS./All Ages ...$2.99
